README.md.recommendation: Add a project README describing the app, how to run locally, and deployment notes.

package.json.recommendation: Create package.json with project metadata, scripts (dev/build/start/test) and dependencies.

lockfile.recommendation: Commit the lockfile produced by your package manager to ensure reproducible installs.

tests.recommendation: Add a basic test harness (Jest/React Testing Library/Vitest) and at least one smoke test for the app.

ci.recommendation: Add CI (GitHub Actions) to run installs, lint, tests, and optionally deploy previews.

LICENSE.recommendation: Add a license file (e.g., MIT) to clarify reuse terms.

.gitignore.recommendation: Add .gitignore to omit node_modules, build artifacts, and local env files.

nextjs_indicators.recommendation: If this is a Next.js project, include next.config.js or a pages/src tree and note that in README.

recommendedNextSteps: Create package.json and install dependencies (next, react, react-dom) so the project can be run locally.
